long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
YourGCC brings significant improvements to the myGCC interface for Grove City College students.  This app will clean up the interface, and make you hate myGCC maybe a little bit less.

Among the enhancements are:
Navigation (left side)
Search (left side)
More concise information about Chapel credits
Maximized screen space
Generally a nicer experience all around

This is a personal project, done to make everyone's lives a little bit easier.
I will be maintaining and improving it regularly.  This is not affiliated with, maintained by, or endorsed by Grove City College.

If you wish to donate, please go to: http://goo.gl/QEhVK

For support, email yourgcc@snydern.com, or comment below.

Thanks for installing!
